description: This file initializes an Agent object with specific configurations, including model, storage, tools, and session parameters, and demonstrates its usage by printing responses and session messages.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with models, storage, and tools to perform tasks and maintain session state.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints the response from the agent for a given prompt.

methods.name: get_messages_for_session
methods.description: Retrieves all messages associated with the current session.
